channel.title: Connecting to the web / Advertising problems
channel.description:
Ok, i'm new to programming and stuff, but to start off i've done some editing to a base server, tested it, and it's good... I have a router but cannot portforward so my only other option is hamachi... And here's the problem... I cannot advertise this on the moparscape server status page because it says it's not online, and it won't let me on the hamachi thing...
So if you know any other equivalents or replacements to port forwarding / hamachi, please say so.
If you would like to try out my server as it is, and give me any tips/ info on what to do or improve, here are the details:
IP: 5.234.255.254 Port: 43594 Silab? Yes Hamachi: Network name: rippscape Network password: 1234
Please come on ASAP and help me out or something, cos i'm stumped on what to do...
Thanks~~

item.title: Connecting to the web / Advertising problems
item.dc:creator: @tayshikozz tayshikozz
item.description:
@tayshikozz wrote:

Ok first do you got a firewall…?does your computer type is vista ? if you got a firewall then put off and if you got a vista then i dont know :)i dont got

Hope it help a bit.

Read full topic

item.title: Connecting to the web / Advertising problems
item.dc:creator: @addsy addsy
item.description:
@addsy wrote:

All i’m saying is that there is nowhere to advertise it, so i can’t, but i want someones opinion on if it is good or not, if people like it then i shall continue to try and spread the word of it, if people don’t like it, i’ll start on a different server.

Read full topic

item.title: Connecting to the web / Advertising problems

item.description:
@addsy wrote:

Ok, i’m new to programming and stuff, but to start off i’ve done some editing to a base server, tested it, and it’s good… I have a router but cannot portforward so my only other option is hamachi… And here’s the problem… I cannot advertise this on the moparscape server status page because it says it’s not online, and it won’t let me on the hamachi thing…

So if you know any other equivalents or replacements to port forwarding / hamachi, please say so.

If you would like to try out my server as it is, and give me any tips/ info on what to do or improve, here are the details:

IP: 5.234.255.254
Port: 43594
Silab? Yes

Thanks~~
